title: Two women avoid jail for their role in Revolut scam that saw doctor lose €11,000
body: Two women in their 20s have been given suspended sentences for their part in a Revolut scam, which saw a doctor lose €11,000.

title: Crypto Exchange Revolut's Disrupts Itself By Cutting Fees 96%
body: A major fintech payments leader with strong crypto ambitions in Europe isn't afraid to sacrifice profitability for volume and stickiness.
